last_phrase: In conclusion, improving our attention, observation, and memory skills can bring substantial benefits in our daily lives. By training ourselves to be attentive and observant, we can learn to see the world with fresh eyes, notice many details that we may have overlooked before, and develop a new appreciation for the world around us. While it may take some effort to start, the rewards of this newfound skill set are well worth it and can help us be more present and focused in all aspects of our lives.
